phrases.original: Hello, {FIRST-NAME}! Although your login is accurate, you'll still need to get authorized before you can start using the Invites App. Just follow the instructions below.
phrases.translated: Hello, {FIRST-NAME}! Although your login is accurate, you'll still need to get authorized before you can start using the Invites App. Just follow the instructions below.

phrases.original: Find someone who can authorize you.
phrases.translated: Find someone who can authorize you.

phrases.original: Within your congregation there are other registered users of the Invites App who have the necessary access to authorize you. You'll need to find one of them.
phrases.translated: Within your congregation there are other registered users of the Invites App who have the necessary access to authorize you. You'll need to find one of them.

phrases.original: Here's a list of authorizing users.
phrases.translated: Here's a list of authorizing users.

phrases.original: When you have found someone who can authorize you, click on the button below. A QR Code will appear. Ask them to authorize you by scanning it.
phrases.translated: When you have found someone who can authorize you, click on the button below. A QR Code will appear. Ask them to authorize you by scanning it.

phrases.original: Once you are approved, just log out and log back in again.
phrases.translated: Once you are approved, just log out and log back in again.

phrases.original: Please authorize {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to use the Invites App, by scanning the QR Code below and completing the form.
phrases.translated: Please authorize {FIRST-NAME} {LAST-NAME} to use the Invites App, by scanning the QR Code below and completing the form.

phrases.original: Please find the following person in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Please find the following person in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.

phrases.original: Please find one of the following people in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Please find one of the following people in the fellowship. Explain that you would like to be authorized to use the Invites App.

phrases.original: No authorizing users were found in your congregation.
phrases.translated: No authorizing users were found in your congregation.
